txt.en: 'Death is no obstacle for me!'
'Something is not right here, [placeholder]...'
Instance: Laying to Rest the Evil Dead
'...the North shall rot all of Eriador!'
'We must hurry, [placeholder]!'
'I sent eight warriors to scout the altar where you encountered Gúrdring...'
'...for it is likely that Ferndúr himself has claimed Ost Brandras.'
'Let us move swiftly to find them!'
'We must reach the altar before this sickness can spread any further, [placeholder]!'
'Nothing shall keep my blight from Middle-earth, not even you, Firstborn!'
'Ferndúr must not be allowed to bring his ruin to more of these lands or my kin!'
'Rest easy, my dear friend...'
'So be it.'
'Silence these lies! Your taunts do not fool me, spirits!'
'A Gaunt-lord is not easily subdued... my warriors knew who they faced, and their training failed them still.'
'Ferndúr's contagion has stripped everything from them...'
'...withered to naught but a husk.'
'What new terror is this?!'
'What has Ferndúr done to you?'
'Not this day! Where I go you shall not follow, and know this...'
'Be silent! My people and these lands shall not suffer your pestilence any longer.'
'Why did you send us to our deaths?'
'Your reign ends today!'
'You knew we stood no chance...'
'His disease consumed us all...'
'You could have saved us!'
'Ah! So the mighty Glorfindel finally graces me with his presence...'
'I wondered how many more Elves I would have to rot away before I drew you forth!'
'Long has it been since Ferndúr last revealed himself to the eyes of the living.'
'Yet, the disease that grips the Trollshaws can be the work of no other.'
'Hold, [placeholder]. There is an ill haze in the air ahead.'
